sections.heading: IN RELATION TO IMMOVABLESArt. 490
sections.text: Accession above and below the surface.Unless otherwise provided by law, the ownership of a tract of land carries with it the ownership of everything that is directly above or under it.The owner may make works on, above, or below the land as he pleases, and draw all

sections.heading: Accession above and below the surface.
